article_title: UN says its work is impossible without phone lines and fuel.
sentence: “People  will  start  to  simply  die  because  of  lack  of  assistance  and  lack  of  medical  care  and  lack  of  fuel  and  lack  of  water  –  they  will  simply  just  die,”  she  said.
